lenders.name: for Krista

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: it is needed.

lenders.name: Rhonda
lenders.loan_because: I believe that if each person that is able to lend bands together with other like-minded people, we can make a huge difference in the world's economy and in the lives of those that are willing to work hard to pull themselves up by the bootstraps.  I have been in business for myself and I know what a difficult task it is to go from dreaming to successful business-owner.

lenders.name: Lova
lenders.loan_because: Being a broke 24 years old economics student, I'm starting a new internet business called blogadollar.com . It will be a FREE ressource for anyone wanting to start his/her own home-based business and website. The problem with websites is they're hard to promote and get new visitors and traffic to. That is the lifeblood of a website and many many people fail and continue to fail at driving traffic to their website. Blogadollar.com is my 24 old student brain's product, it's a new web 2.0 generation blog, I try to bring a huge value to the self little guys entrepreneurs via blogadollar.com, by working hard to give them what they so desperatly want, "Step by Step info about driving swarm of traffic to their blog/website" and finally make it successful and popular. To do that, I intend to and already work very hard on researching a lot of info about how to drive targeted traffic to one's website, sort the info, pull out only what is proven to work and praised by REAL-Life users. I already have a ton of info just waiting to be laid out on blogadollar. I loan because this venture started on may 5th 2007, 3 months ago but really starts to take off only 3 weeks now, because before, I was still having my 2nd semester exams. [I succeded an dgraduated from master 1 to master 2] It's also taking a lot of my time and requires hard work (I mean all day long). It's ok while it's the summer hollyday period. But I'm afraid not to be able to achieve my goals on time without more capital. The goal is to build the blog as much as possible and promote it as much as possible before september. (back to college time). When I'm back to college, I will still push blogadollar very hard and even harder and work very very hard of course, but it is obvious that it's best to do it now while I have all the time while it's summer's hollydays. Instead of having fun outside, like a lot of lucky 24 Year old youngs around, I'm on my desk working hard each and every day now, between my notebooks where I plan everything, and the computer connected to the Internet, where I apply everything I've planned from the notebooks. The notebooks are on topics like on-page optimisation, off-page optimisation, social networking, social bookmarking, blog promotion, internet marketing, taking action, daily tasks, progression status, web 2.0 etc etc... All of this is aimed to make blogadollar as successful and thriving as his counterparts who are earning $10,000 per month, while helping others acheve the same goal. This is a real win-win new venture. Now you know that I'm a 24 years old student, my background is that I'm skilled the most in computers and now in internet in this difficult to live world, and that's why I'm focusing highly on this venture. This is what I can do the best. I'm not best at anything else. So, I'll never let go, and need your help. Without your help, I'll continue and will succed anyway. With your help, I'll continue and succeed way way faster and help way way more people thriving with their home-biz too. This new venture has the huge potential to earn $10,000+ per month in a period as short as 6 to 8 months due to the ad revenue potential like it's other pairs on the market do enjoy already. And the market is wide open for anyone.
lenders.occupational_info: - My aim is to work hard to make blogadollar.com the place that any little home-biz entrepreneur guy thinks of when he struggles getting his/her new web 2.0 generation blog/website to where he wants it to be. He/She wants a lot of traffic, a lot of visitors, a lot of page views, a lot of step by step, REAL step by step info about generating REAL web traffic and building momentum around their own website. - The goal is to show the little guy How to explode his traffic using precise, proven and tested through REAL-Life case studies techniques and methods and finally breathe new-life into their blog/website. - My job will be to boost their site from “ordinary” to extraordinary… - To Show them How to quickly set up their Social Networking presence and avoid the mistakes most people make when they want to leverage their pages for business promotion -How to set their blog apart so it doesn’t look like a “me too” and uses direct marketing principles that “hook” their audience faster than a speeding Ferrari! -The steps for “working” your blog like a pro… avoiding the classic mistakes rookies commit that keep their blogs working AGAINST them! And much much more. I need your help to achieve that faster. You can take a look at blogadollar by clicking this link: blogadollar.com

lenders.name: Yan
lenders.loan_because: I know what the struggles are like to set up your own business - I own a theatre company. In our more developed regions to get a loan, a so-called 'business loan', is as good as asking a blind man to give you directions. Whereas these people have the opportunity to achieve loans through the goodwill of people, avoiding all the financial assessment redtape. I hope that by giving my little every time, I am able to raise somebody's hopes, and who knows? My dollar could be the turning point of someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: Our company trains school students in drama and theatre productions. We also stage our own performances in community outreach programmes (eg. Climate change, anti-smoking, etc), as well as for corporate functions.

lenders.name: Edmundo Santiago
lenders.loan_because:
I wish the money was being lent at 0% interest to the people as I am lending it.

If all money were lent at 0% by all parties involved, then a true revolution would be realized and world-wide poverty would come to an end within this generation.

Removing the interest payment is removing the payment of tribute to the owners of the money monopoly that keeps the economic slavery in place.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach what money is and what it is not.  To learn more visit SmartPeopleSmartMoney.com.

lenders.name: Trish
lenders.loan_because: Although we're just middle-class pensioners by US standards, we're wealthy beyond belief to much of the rest of the world. Education is the key.  I particularly like to loan to women who want to improve their children's lives through education.

lenders.name: Karen, Dundee, Scotland

lenders.name: Us  :)

Others have helped me in the past, and I have the means to help others in turn.

Servi en Chile por dos anos como misionero para la Iglesia de Jesucristo de los Santos de los Ultimos Dias.  Desde entonces he continuado trabajando con gente en necesidad, o por medio de la iglesia, o por medio de la red y sitios como kiva.  Espero que puedo ayudar a otros como otros me han ayudado en el pasado.

Soy soldado en el ejercito de los EEUU.  Soy autor (aun que todavia no se he publicado).

lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving back and helping others who are attempting to help themselves.  It is my way of following the example of Jesus Christ and honoring my West Indian heritage of helping others.

Given the right opportunity one can  rise above the issues that suround them. 

No one chose who, where, when and how we came into this world,  but we can make a difference to help those in need, and those in need can make a difference when given the materials and making the right choices. 

We can all make a difference, and make the right choices. 

This is just the beginning.  

I am also a contributor to Ryan's Well Foundation www.ryanswell.org. & 
Children's International.

lenders.name: www.TechTough.com
lenders.occupation: We custom design BLACK COBRA Panasonic Toughbooks
lenders.loan_because:
I am fortunate to be an entrepreneur in a wealthy modern country which has given me many advantages that other people do not have.

I think we get a deeper meaning in life when we help those less fortunate than us "the secret to living is giving". 

It is only fair that we give back to either our local or global community in some way.
lenders.occupational_info:
We sell the TOUGHEST laptops on Planet Earth !

If you need a laptop for outdoor use, in your car, on a boat or in any harsh environments there is no better choice then a rugged Black Cobra Panasonic Toughbook CF-19 and CF-30

These are used by police, military, etc... because they are on average 10x more reliable then standard consumer laptops and are super Tough. Search for TOUGHBOOK on youtube and see for yourself.

lenders.name: Legere Family
lenders.loan_because: I saw a show on tv and decided even though I'm one person making ends meet, there are other people that who need help too. What better way to make the world a better place than right here starting with one person. I'm glad that I can help someone take needed steps to make their life better and to provide for not only their families but their community. Great idea!!

lenders.name: Sara

lenders.name: Katherine

lenders.occupational_info: I am a natural birth and women's advocate. I want to empower women to make positive choices about their health and wellness.

lenders.name: El Camino
lenders.loan_because: the world is getting bigger and bigger, and yet smaller and smaller.  For people in developing countries who are just as entrepeneurial and just as savvy, but may not have access to the same resources to really get their business going, loaning gives them enough to change their own lives, the lives of their families, and hopefully, the lives of their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with young people who want to give a year of their lives to work at non-profits directly serving the poor.

lenders.name: Ami
lenders.loan_because: I love these children and I want them and others to reach their maximum potential.

CPA-a financial advisor to business and individuals.

Social Worker- one who works for equality, justice and human dignity for all humankind.

lenders.name: Gabriele
lenders.loan_because: This is a moment in my life, where I would like to do something for someone else that I've never done before

lenders.name: Katrina & Pascal
lenders.loan_because: I believe a little can make a lot of difference.

lenders.name: Britt

lenders.name: Brett
lenders.loan_because: I love the world.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.occupational_info: Video Gaming

lenders.name: MASSIMILIANO
lenders.loan_because: I CAN

lenders.name: Rebekah
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I were both missionaries in Brazil before we got married, and we knew so many wonderful people there who worked so hard but due to a lack of resources were unable to get ahead. I loan because I am so grateful for their friendships and for the blessings I have in my own life.

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: if by making loans that are to me relatively small, I can nonetheless make a positive difference in the lives of others, I'm delighted to do so.

lenders.name: NW Girls
lenders.loan_because: Our dad is teaching us the importance of giving to those in need. We look at this opportunity as a "hand up, not a hand out". It makes us feel good that we are helping those in need around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: We are just kids growing up in the beautiful State of Washington in the Pacific Northwest of the United States.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: it's one of the best causes to invest money into!

lenders.name: Anish Shah
lenders.loan_because: We can make this world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an owner of a website that connects  people seeking legal representation with lawyers in their area.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Building relationships and community online using social media.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: It just makes sense to help others whenever possible.  I have been helped by others and  it's nice to pass it on.
lenders.occupational_info: My work includes interior painting, house-sitting, pet-sitting, and house cleaning services.

lenders.name: Aline
lenders.loan_because: I want to.

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Hillary and George
lenders.loan_because: We want to take seriously the call of Jesus to provide for those who are widowed and/or in need. His love for them becomes our love for them, and we hope that, through these gifts, they would experience His love.

lenders.name: Sharron
lenders.loan_because: I watched a program on PBS about KIVA very late one night. I am very bouyed  by the concept of being able to give a tangible message of  support to someone with a vision.  The message is: I have heard you and  I believe in you.
lenders.occupational_info: I work toward improvement in the lives of children and families in the Province where I live.

lenders.name: Meghan
lenders.loan_because: Last year I was the treaurer for a school club.  We found we had some money left over at the end of the year and decided to put it towards a charitable cause.  Kiva is a way to make that money reach more people.
lenders.occupational_info: I make art for video games.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who are working hard to make a better life for themselves and their family.

lenders.name: Emiliio Karam
lenders.loan_because:
I like to give back and help other people who need it the most. 

Sometimes just a bit of help makes a HUGE difference on someone's life... I like to be part of that and hopefully make someone's life a a better one, and making the world a better place for all of us.

I know sounds corny, but I do believe it.
lenders.occupational_info:
I love my life. 
 
I've been entrepreneurial of my life. I've had some downfalls and some very important successes, but nothing compared to what I'm currently doing, and the fun I'm having.

And I get to work where I want, with the people I want, when I want, and also helping a lot of people to do the same.

I believe success should be built upon the success of others and reaching out to helping those who need it.

I'm also a huge fan of personal development. In fact, I'm an NLP Advanced Master Practitionar and Trainer... now it's just for fun, and lots of it!

In 2009, I am launching several business adventures, with the goal of breaking the $1'000,000 mark in online sales.

DOING more, BEING more, making more MONEY, having more FUN, and GIVING BACK more !
